policy.Description: This policy is on a deprecation path. See documentation for guidance: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/datapipeline/latest/DeveloperGuide/dp-iam-roles.html. Default policy for the AWS Data Pipeline service role.

With the BatchPutAttributes operation, you can perform multiple PutAttribute operations in a single call. With the BatchPutAttributes operation, you can perform multiple PutAttribute operations in a single call.
Returns all of the properties of a topic. Topic properties returned might differ based on the authorization of the user.
Returns a list of the requester's topics. Each call returns a limited list of topics, up to 100.
Sends a message to all of a topic's subscribed endpoints.
Prepares to subscribe an endpoint by sending the endpoint a confirmation message.
Deletes a subscription. If the subscription requires authentication for deletion, only the owner of the subscription or the topic's owner can unsubscribe, and an AWS signature is required.
Creates a new queue, or returns the URL of an existing one.
Deletes the specified message from the specified queue.
Deletes up to ten messages from the specified queue.
Deletes the queue specified by the queue URL, regardless of whether the queue is empty.
Gets attributes for the specified queue.
Returns the URL of an existing queue.
Deletes the messages in a queue specified by the queue URL.
Retrieves one or more messages, with a maximum limit of 10 messages, from the specified queue.
